issue.title: [Go][CI] Add Travis CI job for Go on s390x
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9844](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9844). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
As suggested in <https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/8011>, add a Travis CI job for Go on s390x.

comments.body:
